data.lyric:
[ti:Promises]
[ar:Calvin Harris/Sam Smith]
[al:Promises]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.05]Promises - Calvin Harris/Sam Smith
[00:00.68]Lyricist：Sam Smith/Adam Wiles/Jessie Reyez
[00:00.91]Composer：Sam Smith/Adam Wiles/Jessie Reyez
[00:01.14]Producer：Calvin Harris
[00:01.24]Sam Smith：
[00:01.87]Are you drunk enough
[00:04.76]Not to judge what I'm doin'
[00:09.67]Are you high enough
[00:12.54]To excuse that I'm ruined
[00:15.04]'Cause I'm ruined
[00:17.48]Is it late enough
[00:19.93]For you to come and stay over
[00:25.27]Cause we're free to love
[00:27.63]So tease me hmmm
[00:31.47]Sam Smith/Jessie Reyez：
[00:33.61]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[00:37.19]But I'll give you everything tonight
[00:41.41]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[00:45.20]So come get your everything tonight
[00:49.21]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[00:53.02]But I'll give you everything tonight
[00:57.00]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[01:00.74]So come get your everything tonight
[01:02.87]Sam Smith/Jessie Reyez：
[01:04.22]Tonight
[01:05.85]Ha ha ha ha ha ha your everything tonight
[01:10.86]Sam Smith：
[01:12.14]Is it loud enough
[01:14.85]'Cause my body is calling for you calling for you
[01:19.98]I need someone to do the things that I do hmmm
[01:27.70]I'm heating up energy's taking control oh oooh
[01:35.55]I'm speeding up
[01:38.01]My heartbeat's dancing alone
[01:40.53]Sam Smith/Jessie Reyez：
[01:43.86]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[01:47.62]But I'll give you everything tonight
[01:51.65]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[01:55.33]So come get your everything tonight
[01:59.44]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[02:03.10]But I'll give you everything tonight
[02:07.25]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[02:10.96]So come get your everything tonight
[02:13.56]Sam Smith/Jessie Reyez：
[02:14.66]Tonight
[02:16.06]Ha ha ha ha ha ha your everything tonight
[02:20.93]Sam Smith：
[02:21.84]'Cause I need your green light
[02:27.03]Day and night say that you're mine
[02:29.66]'Cause I need your green light
[02:34.83]Day and night say that you're mine
[02:43.92]Say that you're mine
[02:51.81]Say that you're mine
[02:53.15]Sam Smith/Jessie Reyez：
[02:53.89]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[02:57.83]But I'll give you everything tonight
[03:01.97]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[03:05.63]So come get your everything tonight
[03:09.73]I make no promises I can't do golden rings
[03:13.45]But I'll give you everything tonight
[03:17.55]Magic is in the air there ain't no science here
[03:21.15]So come get your everything tonight
[03:23.56]Sam Smith：
[03:24.73]Tonight

[ar:Calvin Harris/Sam Smith]
[al:Promises]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.05]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.68]//
[00:00.91]//
[00:01.14]//
[00:01.24]//
[00:01.87]你喝够了吗
[00:04.76]不要再评论我的所作所为
[00:09.67]你嗨够了吗
[00:12.54]原谅我亲手摧毁的一切
[00:15.04]因为我一无所有
[00:17.48]是否已为时已晚
[00:19.93]而你是否还愿陪我共度良宵
[00:25.27]因为在爱里我们都有选择权
[00:27.63]尽管嘲笑我吧
[00:31.47]//
[00:33.61]我不会做出承诺 无法为你许下婚姻
[00:37.19]但今晚我会为你付出一切
[00:41.41]空气中满是爱的奇妙魔力 不需要科学理论解释
[00:45.20]就来吧 施展你的无穷魅力
[00:49.21]我不会做出承诺 无法为你许下婚姻
[00:53.02]但今晚我会为你付出一切

[01:00.74]就来吧 施展你的无穷魅力

[01:04.22]今晚
[01:05.85]今晚属于你的一切

[01:35.55]速度不自觉加快
[01:38.01]这颗心 情难自已的怦然跳动
